mapper.sql: goods_id, name, image, caption, url, price_before, price_after, introduction, activity, sale, reserve, comment, score, sort1_id, sort2_id, sort3_id, brand_id, shop_id, status, is_marketable
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, name, image, caption, url, price_before, price_after, introduction, activity, sale, reserve, comment, score, sort1_id, sort2_id, sort3_id, brand_id, shop_id, status, is_marketable) values (#{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price_before,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price_after,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort1_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort2_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort3_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shop_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_marketable,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into goods
goods_id,
name,
image,
caption,
url,
price_before,
price_after,
introduction,
activity,
sale,
reserve,
comment,
score,
sort1_id,
sort2_id,
sort3_id,
brand_id,
shop_id,
status,
is_marketable,

mapper.update:
update goods
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
caption = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_before = #{price_before,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
price_after = #{price_after,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale = #{sale,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserve = #{reserve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort1_id = #{sort1_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort2_id = #{sort2_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort3_id = #{sort3_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shop_id = #{shop_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_marketable = #{is_marketable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caption = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_before = #{price_before,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, price_after = #{price_after,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity = #{activity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale = #{sale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve = #{reserve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort1_id = #{sort1_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort2_id = #{sort2_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort3_id = #{sort3_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brand_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shop_id = #{shop_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_marketable = #{is_marketable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
